participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, active, and family-oriented with a strong work ethic.
participant_1.background: I love the flexibility my job provides me with because it allows me to spend time with my family and still have a successful career. I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss. I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them. I live in the city. I have freckles all over my face.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Sociable, enthusiastic, and a bit geeky, with a deep appreciation for relationships.
participant_2.background: I've been in my current relationship for five years, and it's the longest I've ever been with someone. I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. I enjoy eating Italian food. I shop online a lot. I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: Hey! Pretty good! I'm in a relationship and it's the longest one I've ever been in.
That's awesome! I love relationships. I'm single right now but I enjoy being around people in relationships.
What's your favorite part about relationships?
I think it's the feeling of being there for someone and knowing they're there for you. Also, I love the intimacy and physical aspect of it.
I agree! The physical aspect is great. It's also really nice to have someone to talk to and share things with.
Yes! My favorite thing is being able to talk to someone about my day and get their perspective on things.
I love to workout and I also love to cook. I'm really into Italian food.
That sounds delicious! I love Italian food too. I'm not very good at cooking but I love to eat it.
I'm not very good at it either but I love to try new recipes.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common! It was nice meeting you.
You too! I hope we can hang out sometime.
